headline: Industrial Painting & Surface Prep Marketing System
subheadline: A phased approach to dominate Hudson Valley search results for industrial painting, propane tank restoration, and equipment refinishing—starting with SEO, scaling with Google Ads in spring.
situationPoints: Built successful business through word-of-mouth and referrals, but want to control growth instead of waiting for the phone to ring
Sell a lot of work because of painting services, but website only showcases sandblasting—prospects can't see full capabilities
Past Google Ads brought in jobs, but turned everything off this year due to being overwhelmed with work and employee issues
Winter is slow season (can't work in extreme cold), need to use this time strategically to prepare for spring
Want to focus on commercial work: propane tanks, truck frames, trailers, equipment restoration—high-value jobs, not residential work
solutionOverview: We're taking a seasonal approach that works with your business cycle. Phase 1 (January-March) focuses on getting your website dialed in and building organic SEO visibility during the slow winter months. This gives us time to add dedicated painting service pages, showcase your best projects, and start ranking for your target keywords. Phase 2 (Spring) layers in Google Ads to capture high-intent industrial painting searches right when your busy season kicks in and you're ready to handle the volume.

campaigns.name: SEO Foundation (January Start)
campaigns.description: Add industrial painting service pages to your website with professional project photos. Optimize for keywords like 'propane tank painting Hudson Valley,' 'truck frame restoration NY,' 'industrial equipment painting.' Build organic visibility during winter so you're ranking when spring hits.

campaigns.name: Google Search Ads (Spring Launch)
campaigns.description: Capture businesses actively searching for industrial painting, propane tank restoration, and equipment refinishing services. Target commercial buyers with budget authority and immediate project timelines. Launch when you're ready to handle volume.

qualificationCriteria.label: Commercial Projects
qualificationCriteria.description: Industrial/commercial work only (propane tanks, truck frames, trailers, equipment)—not residential

qualificationCriteria.label: Decision Maker
qualificationCriteria.description: Business owner, facilities manager, or authorized buyer

qualificationCriteria.label: Budget Authority
qualificationCriteria.description: Has allocated budget or can approve commercial project spend

qualificationCriteria.label: Service Area
qualificationCriteria.description: Located within Hudson Valley and surrounding service territory

deliverables: 3-5 dedicated industrial painting service pages (propane tanks, truck frames, equipment restoration)
Professional photo integration and page optimization
Local SEO setup (Google Business Profile optimization)
Google Ads account setup and campaign build (Phase 2)
Conversion-focused landing page for industrial painting (Phase 2)
Multi-channel lead capture with call tracking and forms (Phase 2)
Ongoing campaign optimization and monthly reporting

roadmap.description: Technical audit, service page development, photo integration, keyword targeting setup

roadmap.description: Content optimization, local SEO build, ranking monitoring

roadmap.description: Visibility tracking, pre-spring optimization, Google Ads prep

roadmap.description: Campaign build, launch, daily monitoring, scale what's working, refine targeting

guarantee: Once the Google Ads campaign kicks in during spring, we guarantee your phone will start ringing within 14 days. If you don't see qualified industrial painting opportunities flowing in after 14 days of ad spend, we'll refund 100% of that month's management fee.
stipulations: Phase 1 (SEO) minimum 3-month commitment to allow rankings to build
Phase 2 (Google Ads) ad spend maintained at $1,000/month minimum
Leads must be followed up within 4 hours
Project outcomes tracked in shared system
scopeIncludes: Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimization

about.intro: Digital Assembly builds revenue growth systems for service businesses. Since 2016, we've helped 100+ clients across the US, Canada, UK, Australia, and New Zealand generate predictable pipelines through strategic paid advertising and lead qualification. We're not a typical agency - we're partners invested in your growth.

values.title: Results Over Activity
values.description: We measure success by qualified opportunities and closed deals, not clicks or impressions.

faqs.question: How quickly will I start seeing results?
faqs.answer: SEO results typically take 60-90 days to build momentum. You'll see ranking improvements within the first month, but meaningful organic traffic usually appears in months 2-3. Google Ads leads start flowing within 14 days of launch in spring.

faqs.question: Why start with SEO instead of just running ads?
faqs.answer: Winter is your slow season, making it the perfect time to build your organic foundation without the pressure of needing immediate leads. By spring, you'll have both SEO momentum and Google Ads working together—maximizing visibility when you need it most.

faqs.question: What happens if the Google Ads don't work in spring?
faqs.answer: If you meet the agreed stipulations and we don't deliver at least 10 qualified opportunities in 90 days, we refund 100% of our Google Ads management fees for that period.

faqs.question: Can I just do SEO without adding Google Ads later?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You can stay SEO-only if you prefer. Google Ads is optional and only recommended when you're ready to scale volume during peak season.

faqs.question: What do you need from us to make this successful?
faqs.answer: High-quality photos of your best industrial painting work (propane tanks, truck frames, equipment). Fast follow-up on leads (within 4 hours). Monthly check-ins to review what's working.

faqs.question: Can we pause or cancel?
faqs.answer: After the initial 3-month SEO build phase, it's month-to-month with no long contracts. You stay because the system produces opportunities and revenue.
